text: @realDonaldTrump If you were competent or actually cared about the American people you would know that mail in voting would be much more effective at stemming the spread of the coronavirus pandemic. But obviously you only care appealing to your base. At the end of the day you will be responsible

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
